lead_paragraph: Two games on Jan. 1, 2010. One, the outdoor extravaganza at Fenway Park in Boston, the other in Buffalo, where the N.H.L.'s Winter Classic got started on a beautiful snowy New Year's Day in 2008. Home teams listed first:
snippet: Results from games of Friday, Jan. 1.
